title: Steak Marinade
directions: In a blender, mix together the soy sauce, olive oil, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, basil, parsley and pepper. Add in the hot pepper sauce and garlic and blend on high for about 30 seconds until well combined.
Choose any meat you like and pour the marinade over it.
Cover the bowl and refrigerate it for about 8 hours.
Cook the meat as you like and enjoy!
Simple, easy and super delicious! This marinade goes with any type of meat. Just let the meat absorb this amazing sauce and you will see how good it is.
ingredients: ⅓ cup of fresh lemon juice.
1 ½ tbsps of dried parsley flakes.
¼ tsp of hot pepper sauce.
